detail_desc: Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and ties at the sides.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and ties at the sides.
Lined triangle bikini top with moulded, lightly padded cups and ties at the neck and back.
Lined triangle bikini top with moulded, lightly padded cups and ties at the neck and back.

Fully lined bikini top with underwired, moulded, lightly padded cups, frill trims at the top and a knot detail at the front. Narrow ties at the back of the neck and an adjustable metal fastener at the back.
Soft fleece jacket designed to be worn as a thermal mid layer with a stand-up collar and zip down the front. Unlined.
Padded gilet with a detachable, faux fur-trimmed hood. Stand-up collar, zip down the front and side pockets. Slightly longer and rounded at the back.
Court shoes with pointed toes, imitation leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels 8 cm.

Soft, non-wired nursing bra in microfibre with lace details, lightly padded opening cups with space for nursing pads and side support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a wide hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Poncho in an airy crinkled weave containing glittery threads, that is open at the front and sides. Fringe trims.

Bra with self-adhesive cups and no shoulder straps or back making it perfect for wearing under strapless or backless garments. Front fastening. Moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Can be washed and reused.

Bra with self-adhesive cups and no shoulder straps or back making it perfect for wearing under strapless or backless garments. Front fastening. Moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Can be washed and reused.
Long poncho in patterned chiffon with open sides with a button at each side.

Bikers in jersey with a firm shaping effect on the tummy and thighs and a push-up effect on the bum. High waist and a lined gusset. The bikers are designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin.

Bikers in jersey with a firm shaping effect on the tummy and thighs and a push-up effect on the bum. High waist and a lined gusset. The bikers are designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin.
Triangle bikini top with removable inserts, gathered cups and ties at the back and at the back of the neck.
Triangle bikini top with removable inserts, gathered cups and ties at the back and at the back of the neck.
Padded gilet with a detachable, lined hood, zip down the front and side pockets. Lined.
Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with padded cups. Wide, adjustable shoulder straps, a racer back made up of narrow, crossover straps and an elastic hem. Extra firm support.

Seamless sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with jacquard-patterned details. Lightly padded cups with removable inserts, adjustable shoulder straps, a racer back and wide trim at the hem. Light support.

Seamless sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with jacquard-patterned details. Lightly padded cups with removable inserts, adjustable shoulder straps, a racer back and wide trim at the hem. Light support.

Scarf in an airy, patterned cotton weave. Size 95x95 cm.
High-waisted stretch twill trousers in a cotton blend. Fly with a visible zip, fake front pockets and slim legs.
Calf-length pleated skirt in an airy weave with an elasticated waist. Lined.

Fully lined sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back and moulded, padded cups that lift and shape while providing good support. Elasticated hem and a fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes. Medium support.

Microfibre push-up bra with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage, and a front fastening. Adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back and narrow, decorative elastic straps.
Pyjamas in a soft cotton blend. Long-sleeved top in printed sweatshirt fabric in a longer style with ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Leggings in soft jersey with an elasticated waist.

Padded parka with a soft finish, a pile-lined, detachable hood with a faux fur trim, and wind flap with a hook and loop fastener and zip down the front. Fake top pockets, patch front pockets with a flap and fastener, and knitted ribbing at the cuffs. Slightly longer at the back with a single back vent. Lined.
